price: Dan mereka berkata, "Kami lebih banyak mempunyai harta dan anak-anak (daripada kamu) dan kami sekali-kali tidak akan diazab 1242.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
footnotes: 1242. Maksudnya, karena orang-orang kafir itu mendapat nikmat yang besar di dunia,  mereka merasa bahwa mereka dikasihi Tuhan dan tidak akan diazab di akhirat.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū naḥnu aktharu amwālan wa-awlādan wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
